subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 15 points and Nicole Powell added 7 of her 13 in the fourth quarter as the Liberty outscored Chicago by 16-1 in the final period to beat the Sky, 59-49, on Thursday.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 15 points and Nicole Powell added 7 of her 13 in the fourth quarter as the Liberty outscored Chicago by 16-1 in the final period to beat the Sky, 59-49, on Thursday.
